item.title: universal file converter + compressor with python
item.description: [[learning programming in python through chatgpt]] abstract basic python syntax before getting started its best you (or more fittingly i) know the basics of python, assuming you know python already you can skip this part, its more just note taking for me to learn python. // variables: in python, variables are used to store data. you can assign these values to these variables using the = operator as seen below. name = "converter" version = 1.0 in this example, the variable name is assigned the string converter as its value, and the variable version has been assigned a floating point number (whole number containing decimal point) of 1.
